prompt: Validate Phase 1 remediation plan based on actual SCWT test results
output: Based on phase1_foundation_scwt_20250830_155549.json results: Phase 1 failed with precision 88% (target 85% - PASSED) but knowledge reuse 12% (target 30% - FAILED). Test showed API authentication failures causing all 3 test tasks to fail with 401 unauthorized errors. Proposed fixes: PHASE 1.1 Fix API Authentication System, PHASE 1.2 Repair Agent Communication Protocol, PHASE 1.3 Optimize Knowledge Reuse System. Are these remediation steps technically sound and comprehensive?

context.issues: API key authentication, all 3 test tasks failed with 401 errors
